frontmatter.name: Error message describes invalid form field value

frontmatter.name: Focusable element has no keyboard trap
frontmatter.description: This rule checks for keyboard traps. This includes use of both standard and non-standard keyboard navigation to navigate through all content without becoming trapped.

fields.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"80af7b","name":"Focusable element has no keyboard trap","rule_type":"composite","description":"This rule checks for keyboard traps. This includes use of both standard and non-standard keyboard navigation to navigate through all content without becoming trapped.\n","accessibility_requirements":{"wcag20:2.1.2":{"forConformance":true,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"},"wcag-technique:G21":{"forConformance":false,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"}},"input_rules":["a1b64e","ebe86a"],"acknowledgments":{"authors":["Geir Sindre Fossøy","Dagfinn Rømen","Anne Thyme Nørregaard"]}}

frontmatter.name: Focusable element has no keyboard trap via non-standard navigation

frontmatter.name: Focusable element has no keyboard trap via standard navigation

frontmatter.name: Zoomed text node is not clipped with CSS overflow
frontmatter.description: This rule checks that text nodes are not unintentionally clipped by overflow, when a page is zoomed to 200% on 1280 by 1024 viewport;

fields.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"59br37","name":"Zoomed text node is not clipped with CSS overflow","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks that text nodes are not unintentionally clipped by overflow, when a page is zoomed to 200% on 1280 by 1024 viewport;\n","accessibility_requirements":{"wcag20:1.4.4":{"forConformance":true,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"}},"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling"],"acknowledgments":{"authors":["Wilco Fiers"],"citations":["The Raven, poem by Edgar Allan Poe"]}}

frontmatter.name: `Audio` or `video` that plays automatically has no audio that lasts more than 3 seconds
frontmatter.description: `audio` or `video` that plays automatically does not output audio for more than 3 seconds.

fields.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"aaa1bf","name":"`Audio` or `video` that plays automatically has no audio that lasts more than 3 seconds","rule_type":"atomic","description":"`audio` or `video` that plays automatically does not output audio for more than 3 seconds.\n","accessibility_requirements":{"wcag-technique:G60":{"forConformance":false,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"}},"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling","Audio output","Visual output"],"acknowledgments":{"authors":["Anne Thyme Nørregaard","Bryn Anderson"]}}

frontmatter.name: `aria-*` attribute is defined in WAI-ARIA
frontmatter.description: This rule checks that each `aria-` attribute specified is defined in ARIA 1.1.

fields.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"5f99a7","name":"`aria-*` attribute is defined in WAI-ARIA","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks that each `aria-` attribute specified is defined in ARIA 1.1.\n","accessibility_requirements":null,"input_aspects":["DOM Tree"],"acknowledgments":{"authors":["Jey Nandakumar"]}}

frontmatter.name: `audio` element content has text alternative
frontmatter.description: This rule checks if audio only elements have a text alternative available.

fields.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"e7aa44","name":"`audio` element content has text alternative","rule_type":"composite","description":"This rule checks if audio only elements have a text alternative available.\n","accessibility_requirements":{"wcag20:1.2.1":{"forConformance":true,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"},"wcag-technique:G158":{"forConformance":false,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"}},"input_rules":["2eb176","afb423"],"acknowledgments":{"authors":["Wilco Fiers","Brian Bors","John Hicks","Rafal Charlampowicz"]}}

frontmatter.name: `audio` element content has transcript
frontmatter.description: Non-streaming `audio` elements must have a text alternative for all included auditory information.

fields.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"2eb176","name":"`audio` element content has transcript","rule_type":"atomic","description":"Non-streaming `audio` elements must have a text alternative for all included auditory information.\n","accessibility_requirements":null,"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling","Audio output","Language"],"acknowledgments":{"authors":["Wilco Fiers","Brian Bors"]}}

frontmatter.name: `audio` element content is media alternative for text
frontmatter.description: This rule checks `audio` is a media alternative for text on the page.

fields.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"afb423","name":"`audio` element content is media alternative for text","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks `audio` is a media alternative for text on the page.\n","accessibility_requirements":null,"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling","Audio output","Language"],"acknowledgments":{"authors":["Wilco Fiers","Brian Bors"]}}

frontmatter.name: `audio` or `video` avoids automatically playing audio
frontmatter.description: This rule checks that audio or video that plays automatically does not have audio that lasts for more than 3 seconds or has an audio control mechanism to stop or mute it.

fields.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"80f0bf","name":"`audio` or `video` avoids automatically playing audio","rule_type":"composite","description":"This rule checks that audio or video that plays automatically does not have audio that lasts for more than 3 seconds or has an audio control mechanism to stop or mute it.\n","accessibility_requirements":{"wcag20:1.4.2":{"forConformance":true,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"},"wcag-technique:G60":{"forConformance":false,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"},"wcag-technique:G170":{"forConformance":false,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"}},"input_rules":["4c31df","aaa1bf"],"acknowledgments":{"authors":["Anne Thyme Nørregaard","Bryn Anderson"]},"htmlHintIgnore":["title-require"]}

frontmatter.name: `audio` or `video` that plays automatically has a control mechanism
frontmatter.description: audio or video that plays automatically must have a control mechanism.

frontmatter.name: `id` attribute value is unique

frontmatter.description: This rule checks that `iframe` elements with identical accessible names embed the same resource or equivalent resources.

Links with identical accessible names have equivalent purpose

Object element has non-empty accessible name

`role` attribute has valid value

Headers attribute specified on a cell refers to cells in the same table element
All table header cells have assigned data cells

`video` element content is media alternative for text
`video` element visual content has audio description
